tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE demand_analysis (
  demand_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  demand_date DATE,
  demand_amount INT,
  demand_forecast FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE demand_variability_statistical_models (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(255),
    demand_pattern VARCHAR(255),
    seasonality_pattern VARCHAR(255),
    accuracy_metrics VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE robust_forecasting_strategies (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_name VARCHAR(255),
    forecasting_method VARCHAR(255),
    risk_assessment VARCHAR(255),
    efficiency_metrics VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE demand_variation_analysis (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name STRING,
    demand_amount FLOAT,
    demand_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE statistical_models (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name STRING,
    model_type STRING,
    model_accuracy FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE forecasting_strategies (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_name STRING,
    forecasting_method STRING,
    effectiveness_rating FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE demand_data (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
product_name VARCHAR(50),
quantity INT,
price DECIMAL);

CREATE TABLE statistical_models (model_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
model_name VARCHAR(50),
model_type VARCHAR(50),
parameters TEXT);

CREATE TABLE forecasting_strategies (strategy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
strategy_name VARCHAR(50),
implementation VARCHAR(50),
performance_metrics TEXT);

CREATE TABLE demand_forecast (forecast_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
demand_date DATE,
forecasted_quantity INT,
accuracy DECIMAL);

CREATE TABLE ForecastData ( 
   id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
   product_id INT, 
   forecast_date DATE, 
   forecast_quantity INT, 
   confidence_level DECIMAL(5, 4) 
);
